author: Chao Hick Tin JA (delivering the judgment of the court):
casename: Nike International Ltd v Campomar SL
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; Andrew Phang Boon Leong J; Yong Pung How CJ
counsel: Harry Elias SC and Zee Yeng Yun (Harry Elias Partnership) for the appellant; Patrick Yap and Prithipal Singh (K L Tan and Associates) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Trade Marks and Trade Names/Revocation/Appeal against High Court decision not to revoke registration of trade mark on ground of non-use for period of five years immediately preceding date of application/Whether overwhelmingly convincing evidence of single transaction use of mark within five-year period adduced by proprietor of mark/Section 22(1)(a) Trade Marks Act (Cap 332, 1999 Rev Ed)
